short_reason: CON wins by effectively defending the Vienna Convention framework and demonstrating that PRO's official/personal distinction is unworkably subjective. CON's impacts (diplomatic destabilization, retaliation cycles) are more concrete and probable than PRO's speculative accountability benefits. PRO failed to provide evidence of widespread abuse or adequately respond to reciprocity concerns. CON's existing mechanisms argument (waivers, persona non grata) went largely unrefuted.
